text.page:
113
102-57a @#/ /bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ o~M ga ga bA hi khA hi/ hU~M hU~M/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ bra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/

114
102-57b phaT phaT/ sarba dur ni mit+ta/ duHswa p+na shIn+ta~M ku ru swA hA/ sangs rgyas stong gi sngags 'di ni/ /gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes grags te/ /las rnams gang dag stong phrag ni/ /brgyad cu dang ni dgu phrag lnga/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams dang / /bkra shis dpal grags thams cad byed/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /lan cig bzlas bas sel bar byed/ /gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho//
